Gabriel Cosmetics inc. Balancing Cleanser

Brand: Gabriel Cosmetics

Category: Exfoliant/Scrub

Brand: Gabriel Cosmetics

Category: Exfoliant/Scrub

Ingredients: Aloe Vera Juice, Glycerin, Emulsifying Wax, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) (&) Maltodextrin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) (&) Helianthus Annuus, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Salix Alba Bark (White Willow Bark) Extract, Laminaria Digitata (Kelp) Extract, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
